name: Ducklings (BarfightSpectator)
description:
Heya, early days on this one, let me know what you think.

I do plan to build an ingame level editor soon™, so you can make and share your own levels after you're through the campaign.  First there are some more tile types I wanna throw in tho. Ice for one, so you slide until you hit the next non-ice tile. Should allow for some nice puzzles.
